mapper.select: select count(*) from CLASSLIST where CL_COUNT > 0 OR CL_DELETED = 0

SELECT CL_NO as "cl_no", CL_TITLE AS "cl_title", CL_UID AS "id", CL_RECOMMENDS AS "recommends", CL_VIEWS AS "views", CL_REGDATE AS "regdate", CL_UPPDATE AS "upddate" FROM ( SELECT (RANK() OVER(ORDER BY CL_NO DESC))ROWNUMS, CLASSLIST.* FROM CLASSLIST WHERE CL_COUNT > 0 OR CL_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY CL_NO DESC)
WHERE ROWNUMS > ((#{page}-1)*#{amount}) and ROWNUMS <= (#{page}*#{amount})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CL( CL_NO, CL_TAG, CL_TITLE, CL_DESCRIPTION, CL_UID ) VALUES( #{cl_no}, #{cl_tag}, #{cl_title}, #{cl_description}, #{id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE B SET CL_TAG = #{cl_tag}, CL_TITLE = #{cl_title}, CL_DESCRIPTION = #{cl_description} WHERE CL_UID = #{id} AND CL_NO = #{cl_no} AND CL_STATUS != 'N'
mapper.select: UPDATE LE SET LE_VIEWS = LE_VIEWS + 1 WHERE LE_NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE LE SET LE_RECOMMENDS = LE_RECOMMENDS +(#{div}) WHERE LE_NO = #{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from LE where LE_STATUS = 'P' AND LE_CLNO = #{cl_no}

SELECT LE_CLNO as "cl_no", LE_NO as "no", LE_TITLE AS "title", LE_RECOMMENDS AS "recommends", LE_VIEWS AS "views", LE_REGDATE AS "regdate", LE_UPDDATE AS "upddate" FROM (SELECT (RANK() OVER(ORDER BY LE_NO DESC))ROWNUMS, LE.* FROM LE WHERE LE_STATUS = 'P' AND LE_CLNO = #{cl_no} ORDER BY LE_NO DESC)
WHERE ROWNUMS > ((#{page}-1)*#{amount}) and ROWNUMS <= (#{page}*#{amount})
